Submodules¶

opencda.scenario_testing.platoon_joining_2lanefree_carla module¶

Scenario testing: merging vehicle joining a platoon in the customized 2-lane freeway simplified map sorely with carla

opencda.scenario_testing.platoon_joining_2lanefree_carla.run_scenario(opt, config_yaml)¶

opencda.scenario_testing.platoon_joining_2lanefreecomplete_carla module¶

Scenario testing: merging vehicle joining a platoon in the customized 2-lane freeway sorely with carla Warning: You have to load the 2lanefreecomplete map into your ue4 editor before running this
